_sText:
Bhop_Frost_Bite
------------
Map by ThePeanutBaron
Special thanks to :
patq = StudioBhop Textures Chaoz = Bonus Lost = SkyboxTexture (http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/14) Beta testers:
Yeti Virus ChaoZ Info:
The map includes 10 levels that go up in diffculty and a big bonus level created by ChaoZ and a little easy xc. It also includes ambient sounds, custom textures and three special scouts for prizes for the first 3 to finish. This map is perfect for a timer as it is short and easy. More:
For more bhop maps visit the studio : http://www.fpsbanana.com/studios/21393 For more by me visit: http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/457339 For more by Chaoz visit: http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/534424 THANKS & HAVE FUN
Please remeber this map is still v1 and optimazation an other work still needs to be done on the map, but I feel the map is ready for its first realse.
